title: Bobby & Jens: Descending genius Matej Mohorič talks dropper posts, pedaling super tuck and winning for Gino Mäder
content:
Highly articulate Slovenian rider gives a downhill masterclass, including his daring Milan-Sanremo triumph.

Read the full article at Bobby & Jens: Descending genius Matej Mohorič talks dropper posts, pedaling super tuck and winning for Gino Mäder on Velo.
author: sstokes
